Class SettingsTest

java.lang.Object
src.Test.SettingsTest
class SettingsTest extends Object
Unit tests for the Settings class. This class contains tests to verify the functionality of the Settings class.

  • Method Details

    • setUp

      @BeforeEach public void setUp()
      Sets up the test environment before each test. Initializes the Settings instance with a mock Gameplay instance.

    • testCreateButtonPanel

      @Test public void testCreateButtonPanel()
      Tests the createButtonPanel method. Verifies that the button panel is created with the correct components.

    • testApplyButton

      @Test public void testApplyButton()
      Tests the applyButton method. Verifies that the apply button is created with the correct properties.

    • testCreateHeaderLabel

      @Test public void testCreateHeaderLabel()
      Tests the createHeaderLabel method. Verifies that the header label is created with the correct text and properties.

    • testExitButton

      @Test public void testExitButton()
      Tests the exitButton method. Verifies that the exit button is created with the correct properties.

    • testCreateSliderPanel

      @Test public void testCreateSliderPanel()
      Tests the createSliderPanel method.

      Verifies that the slider panel is created with the correct components and initial values.

    • testCreateKeyBindPanel

      @Test public void testCreateKeyBindPanel()
      Tests the createKeyBindPanel method. Verifies that the key bind panel is created with the correct components and initial key.
